project.component: { "keyToString": { ".NET Project.FindRomCover.executor": "Run", "Notification.DisplayName-DoNotAsk-Vcs Important Messages": "VCS important messages", "Notification.DoNotAsk-Vcs Important Messages": "true", "Rider.SolutionAnalysis.ShowIgnored": "true", "RunOnceActivity.OpenProjectViewOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "git-widget-placeholder": "master", "ignore.virus.scanning.warn.message": "true", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.detected.package.tslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "node.js.selected.package.tslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "editor.preferences.appearance", "vue.rearranger.settings.migration": "true" } }

task.summary: Default task

Update application logic and settings
This commit modifies the logic of the 'FindRomCover' application along with its respective configuration settings. Notably, functions in the 'SimilarityCalculator' class have been modified for brevity and readability, the general application's logic (in 'MainWindow.xaml.cs') has been altered slightly, and additional file extensions have been added to the 'settings.xml' configuration file.

Add missing total count and refactor workspace settings
A new feature has been added to the 'FindRomCover' application, providing a total count for missing images. Additionally, workspace settings in the .idea directory have been updated and unnecessary configurations, including breakpoints in XDebuggerManager, have been removed for cleaner maintenance.

Add missing count feature and refactor workspace settings
A new feature providing a total count for missing images was added to the 'FindRomCover' application. Workspace settings in the .idea directory were updated and unnecessary configurations, including breakpoints in XDebuggerManager, were removed for cleaner maintenance.

Update workspace comments and increase task counter
This commit updates the comments in the ChangeListManager and the task section of the workspace.xml file in the FindRomCover project. Furthermore, it increments the localTasksCounter value indicating the number of tasks associated with the project.

Add Settings class and improve SimilarityCalculator and UI
Added a new Settings class to handle application settings. Improved handling of SimilarityCalculator by cleaning code and improving readability. Initialized code for UI to display settings values. Also implemented changes to 'settings.xml', i.e, settings loading and saving mechanism.

Update workspace settings and improve app logic
Improved the application logic and settings in FindRomCover. This includes adding a new Settings class to manage application settings, enhancing readability and code cleanliness in the SimilarityCalculator, and initializing UI to show settings values. Also introduced alterations to settings.xml for better settings loading and saving mechanism.

Update workspace settings and application logic
This commit cleans and improves the coding of workspace settings in the FindRomCover project. The main focus areas include introducing a new Settings class, refining code in SimilarityCalculator, and initializing UI to display new setting values. Additionally, a new task has been added to localTasksCounter.

Update UI, application logic and modify workspace settings
This commit incorporates improvements to the application logic and employing workspace settings in FindRomCover. Adding a new Settings class provides application settings management. Code readability and cleanliness have been enhanced in SimilarityCalculator. Changes include initializing UI to present setting values and adjustments to settings.xml for optimizing settings loading and saving mechanism. A new task has also been appended to localTasksCounter.

Update project settings and add global.json for .NET 8.0
Added a global.json file to specify the .NET 8.0 SDK version and updated project settings for Rider. Also incremented the project version in FindRomCover.csproj to 1.4.0.0 to accommodate new changes.

Refactor class properties and adjust Jaro calculation
Replaced settable properties with init-only properties in ImageData for immutability. Commented out the initial Jaro calculation line and corrected the casting of transpositions in SimilarityCalculator. Updated project file to allow unsafe code.

Update donation URL in MainWindow.xaml.cs
Changed the donation link from "buymeacoffee" to the official website's donation page. This ensures users are directed to the most appropriate and official platform for contributions.

Update donation URL in MainWindow.xaml.cs
Changed the donation link from "buymeacoffee" to the official website's donation page. This ensures users are directed to the most appropriate and official platform for contributions.

Update workspace.xml task records
Added new work items and tasks in workspace.xml. Incremented task counter to accommodate recent changes, including updates to donation URL and task summaries.

Integrate MahApps.Metro for theme support
Added MahApps.Metro styling and theme support across the application. Updated App.xaml with resource dictionaries, modified MainWindow.xaml to utilize MetroWindow, and added theme change handling in MainWindow.xaml.cs. Included new properties for theme settings in Settings.cs and saved these settings to settings.xml. Updated project file to include necessary packages and updated the .NET target framework.

Add theme.png image to FindRomCover directory
Added a new file, theme.png, to the images subdirectory within FindRomCover. This image will be used as a visual theme element for the application.

Add menu icons for Donate, About, and Exit options
Introduced image icons to the Donate, About, and Exit menu items in MainWindow.xaml to enhance user interface aesthetics and improve navigation. Additionally, updated the project file to include the new image resources.

Support command-line arguments for folder paths
Added code to process command-line arguments for ImageFolder and RomFolder paths. This change sets the respective folder paths during application startup, enhancing automation and flexibility in usage.

Support command-line arguments for folder paths
Added code to process command-line arguments for ImageFolder and RomFolder paths. This enhances automation and flexibility during application startup by setting folder paths dynamically. Updated workspace.xml to include new tasks and meta information.

Automatically load missing images list at startup.
This update modifies the MainWindow.xaml.cs to call the LoadMissingImagesList() function when the application starts with the proper command-line arguments. It also updates workspace.xml with new work item task entries. This addition aims to enhance the initial setup process by ensuring missing images are identified immediately.

Load settings earlier in MainWindow initialization
Moved LoadSettings() to execute before command-line argument processing in MainWindow.xaml.cs for improved initialization sequence. Also, updated workspace.xml with new task entries for better tracking.

Refactor settings loading and improve UI layout
Refactored the settings file handling by using a consistent path and simplified the file existence checks. Improved the layout of MainWindow.xaml by adjusting grid column widths and enhancing the ListBox UI for missing images. This update ensures better settings management and a more user-friendly interface.

Update settings.xml and upgrade ControlzEx package
Added new file extensions (lnk, exe) to settings.xml and rearranged entries. Upgraded ControlzEx package from version 5.0.2 to 6.0.0 for improved library features and stability.

Fix argument handling and order of settings loading
Adjusted argument handling to check for exactly two arguments. Moved the LoadSettings function to ensure it executes correctly and revert ControlzEx package version. This ensures proper initialization and configuration.

Add About dialog, error logging, and theme management.
Implemented an "About" dialog with app info and navigation hyperlinks. Introduced comprehensive error logging with API integration for error reports. Enhanced theme management allowing dynamic theme changes and saving settings.

Update XML save logic and UI labels
Refactored XML saving logic to handle supported extensions and image size separately. Revised the search query label updating in MainWindow.xaml.cs to improve clarity and emphasize the selected file and algorithm.

Replaced settable properties with init-only properties in ImageData for immutability. Commented out the initial Jaro calculation line and corrected the casting of transpositions in SimilarityCalculator. Updated project file to allow unsafe code.

Updated App.xaml with resource dictionaries, modified MainWindow.xaml to utilize MetroWindow, and added theme change handling in MainWindow.xaml.cs. Added code to process command-line arguments for ImageFolder and RomFolder paths. This enhances automation and flexibility during application startup by setting folder paths dynamically. Updated workspace.xml to include new tasks and meta information.

Automatically load missing images list at startup.
This update modifies the MainWindow.xaml.cs to call the LoadMissingImagesList() function when the application starts with the proper command-line arguments. It also updates workspace.xml with new work item task entries. This addition aims to enhance the initial setup process by ensuring missing images are identified immediately.

Fix argument handling and order of settings loading
Adjusted argument handling to check for exactly two arguments. Moved the LoadSettings function to ensure it executes correctly and revert ControlzEx package version. This ensures proper initialization and configuration.

Add About page, error logging, and theme support.
Implemented an About dialog with application version and hyperlinks. Introduced error logging with file and API reporting capabilities. Enhanced the app with dynamic theme and accent color settings.
